questions.question: 1. If I hadn’t gone to the party where we met, we wouldn’t be friends today.

choices.answer: I didn’t go to the party.

questions.question: 2. If we weren’t friends, we wouldn’t have flown to Italy together last summer!

choices.answer: We never traveled to Italy together.
We would like to go to Italy one day.
We had a vacation in Italy last summer.

questions.question: 3. If we hadn’t flown to Italy last summer, wouldn’t be so interested in learning Italian now.
4.If we weren’t interested in learning Italian, we wouldn’t have enrolled in Italian lessons.

choices.answer: We don’t often go to the Language Center.
Italian is absolutely boring for us.
We never registered to language classes.

questions.question: 5.If we weren’t taking Italian, we would've mispronounced the menu at Mama Roma last night.

choices.answer: We have never gone to Mama Roma.

questions.question: 6. If Jamie hadn’t been such a sweetheart since we met, I wouldn’t love him so much right now.
7. If I didn’t love him, I wouldn’t have married him.

choices.answer: I don’t have any relationship with Jamie.
I have bad feelings for Jamie.

questions.question: 8. If I wasn’t married with Jamie, I would’ve married his brother Edward.
9. If I had married Edward, I’d live in a bigger house and travel around the world.

choices.answer: Edward and I are a couple.
I live in a modest house.
I can afford trips everywhere I want.

questions.question: 10. If I traveled around the world, I’d still be unhappy because only Jamie makes me happy.

choices.answer: I love Jamie & he loves me.
